items.sentence: I have a lot to do today, so if you don\'t mind, I\'d like to have this discussion at another time.
I think it\'s unlikely that the next version of Windows will come out before the end of this month.
Tom did everything within his power to save the children that were trapped in the burning building.
Tom and Mary frequently complained that they never had time to spend together without the children.
It\'s very late. Why don\'t you get ready for bed, and we\'ll talk about this again in the morning?
